PhoneGap as a Solution

What is PhoneGap?

  • Cross platform mobile application framework
  • Essentially a web browser stretched across an entire application
  • Javascript bridge to native APIs
  • Use web technologies to build applications and access native functions
  • Web browser is wrapped with a native application that provides access to native APIS (camera,compass,accelorameter)
  • Fully installable application that can be installed just like a completely native application
  • PhoneGap applications can be distributed through application stores.
